text: HempLucid Organic Full-Spectrum CBD for Pets Review 2024: Ragz’s Trial Results & Experience By Sara Seitz Updated on Click to Skip Ahead We give HempLucid Organic Full-Spectrum CBD for Pets a rating of 4.8 out of 5 stars Starting your pet on CBD oil is a slippery slope. These products can be incredibly effective for treating a wide variety of health and behavioral issues. But they can also be very costly, especially considering that you have to use them daily to see results. If the cost of quality CBD has you hesitating, you might be interested in learning more about HempLucid Organic Full-Spectrum CBD for Pets. This USDA organic CBD oil contains a respectable 10mg of CBD per milliliter and costs a fraction of what other effective oils do. But does it work as well? That’s what I set out to discover when I tested this CBD product on my thirteen-year-old Dalmatian mix, Ragz. Find out if this bargain organic oil is worth it in my HempLucid Organic Full-Spectrum CBD for Pets review, below. Overview Product Type: | CBD oil | Best Suited For: | Pets with anxiety, joint pain, sleep problems, and more | Price Range: | Highly affordable | Ingredients: | Organic hemp seed oil, chicken flavoring, organic full-spectrum hemp cannabidiol oil, bacon flavoring | Concentration: | 300mg CBD per bottle (10mg CBD per ml) | Options: | Chicken flavor – 30ml | Spectrum: | Full-spectrum | Storage: | Refrigerate after opening | Recommended Dose: | 5-15 lbs: ½-1 dropper; 15-75 lbs: 1-2 droppers; over 75 lbs: 2-3 droppers | Our Experience My old lady dog, Ragz, has tested a variety of CBD products, from the pricey to the affordable. Within the latter end of that spectrum, we have found a few products that were surprisingly effective for how low-priced they were. But we have rarely encountered USDA organic products at this price point. This is one of many reasons that HempLucid Organic Full-Spectrum CBD for Pets intrigued me. This CBD oil has all the markings of an effective, high-quality oil: it’s organic, full-spectrum, made from American-grown hemp, and comes in a relatively high concentration. But it’s priced well below what I would expect. This had me wondering how well it would work. Ragz, who has long relied on CBD oil to relieve her joint pain, was up for the task of finding this out. After dosing her meals twice a day for the last three weeks, I can tell you that this CBD oil definitely works. After about a week and a half on this new product, I could see a clear difference in Ragz’s pain levels. She seemed to be in far less pain on walks and was visibly less stiff when she got up from naps. There was definitely a lot to like about this product as well as a few downsides. I love that this product is USDA-certified organic. It’s also GMP-certified, made from Colorado hemp, and third-party lab-tested. This is a full-spectrum product which means it contains CBD along with other cannabinoids, including CBDV, CBG, CBC, and THC. These other trace elements help enhance the effects CBD has on the body. While high levels of THC can be dangerous for dogs and other pets, this product has less than 0.3%, which is considered safe for pets. In fact, the lab tests consistently put THC levels for HempLucid Organic Full-Spectrum CBD for Pets below 0.05%. Ragz and I both liked how easy this was to add to her meals. While the added flavors didn’t make it palatable enough for her to gobble up straight, she had no problem licking it up along with her normal food. Of course, the price is a huge selling point for me, too. I typically pay up to twice this amount for organic pet CBD. Dosing would have been quite a bit easier if HempLucid included measurement markers on their dropper. One ml or “one dose” is actually only ¾ of a dropper, which makes it hard to eyeball a half or quarter dose. While 10mg of CBD per milliliter is a good concentration since it makes dosing both large and small dogs fairly easy, I do wish HempLucid offered other concentration options. For Ragz, I found this concentration to be a little low. I ended up upping her dose to one and a half droppers after a couple of weeks. This makes for a lot of added oil, so I would certainly buy the higher-concentration option if they had it. But overall, Ragz and I were very happy with this product. You just can’t beat the price given the quality and effectiveness of this oil. Pros & Cons - USDA-certified organic - Full-spectrum oil - Third-party lab tested - 10mg CBD per ml - Hemp seed carrier oil - Very affordable - Chicken flavored - No measurement markers - Only one concentration available Key Features Easy Dosing This pet CBD oil has a moderately high concentration, which makes for easy dosing. Small dogs typically only need a ½ dropper to see the effects, while large dogs will do well with 2 to 3 droppers per dose. And since this oil contains both chicken and bacon flavoring, most dogs will eagerly lick it up along with their food or favorite treats. You can even squeeze the oil straight into their mouth. Quality Ingredients HempLucid Organic Full-Spectrum CBD for Pets is made with USDA organic hemp seed oil and full-spectrum CBD oil. Hemp seed oil is a great carrier oil for CBD because it’s naturally high in flavonoids and terpenes which help to increase CBD’s effectiveness. Full-spectrum CBD oil contains minor cannabinoids that also help to increase CBD’s effect on the body. The fact that both these oils are organic means you don’t have to worry about pesticides or other impurities. Highly Affordable This pet CBD oil is easily one of the most affordable products I’ve found. In fact, it’s priced better than many of the non-organic options I recommend. If you have a dog with painful joints or chronic anxiety that requires daily CBD dosing, you will be hard-pressed to find a more affordable effective option than HempLucid. About HempLucid HempLucid has been creating quality human and pet CBD products from US-grown hemp since 2016. Manufacturing: | All HempLucid CBD products are made in the USA | Sourcing: | This company sources all of their hemp in Colorado | USDA Organic: | HempLucid has maintained USDA Certification since 2020 | Testing: | All their products are third-party independent lab tested for purity and concentration | Predictability: | They use cloned hemp for unprecedented product predictability | Is HempLucid Organic Full-Spectrum CBD for Pets a Good Value? Compared to competitors, this product is incredibly well-priced. In fact, it is more affordable than many non-organic pet CBD oils, making it a great value. Best of all, if you sign up for HempLucid’s subscription program you can save an additional 5% on an already low-priced option. How We Tested As with all pet CBD products, I enlisted my pets to help test this oil. I dosed the oil according to the product dosing recommendations for the first two weeks. At this point, I adjusted the dose based on my observations and continued for an additional week. I started with a dose of 1 ml twice daily and increased it to 1.5 ml twice daily to achieve optimal results. I tested the oil by giving it straight to my dog, putting it on treats, and adding it to her food. She was not a big fan of taking the oil straight and it was a bit messy on treats. In the end, she received the vast majority of her doses in her meals and happily ate the oil this way. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ) How long will this product take to start working? It typically takes 2 to 4 weeks of consistent use to see the full effect of CBD products. However, you are likely to see an acute effect within 45 minutes after the first dose. Are the added flavors organic? The chicken and bacon flavorings are not listed as organic, however, the product is certified USDA organic. How much THC is in this product? This full-spectrum product contains less than 0.3% THC, which is the maximum recommended amount for pet products. According to the most recent lab results, the actual value is much less, sitting at around 0.05% THC. Conclusion If you’ve been on the hunt for an affordable, organic pet CBD oil that actually works, I highly recommend checking out HempLucid Organic Full-Spectrum CBD for Pets. Not only is this full-spectrum oil USDA-certified organic and highly effective, but it costs less than most non-organic CBD oils you’ll find. Better still, it is easy to dose, contains a relatively high concentration of CBD, and is flavored with chicken and bacon so your pup will happily lick it up.
